about_the_game:
Let the noises guide you in The Tsar’s Secret. An isometric 2.5D stealth game about infiltrating the Tsar’s palace. The chore mechanic allows you to change between 2 different modes: Tenebris & Silentium. Choose between deafening or blinding the palace guards, but be careful! It will also affect how you see the game.

2 GAME MODES



Tenebris
Nullify the sight sense. You and your enemies will navigate the palace just by hearing: noises such as footsteps, the fireplace or the tick-tocking clock on the wall will guide you. The waves created by sounds will reveal the map. Stay still and the enemies won’t catch you.

Silentium
Nullify the hearing sense. You and your enemies will see everything, but every sound will become distant. Move freely, but be careful not to get in their line of sight.

THE STORY



"When I arrived to Mitrovia I only knew my mission, but I didn’t know that the outcome of The Conflict would depend on me. Only I have the powers that can save my country."
Enjoy a story narrated by Grigori, the main character, with voice over acting. Grigori is a double agent with the mission of stealing classified documents from The Great Conflict. Their nation awaits for him to return, but the palace of Mitrovia is full of guards patrolling the corridors. Thankfully, he knows how to control ancient powers and alter the senses with occultist magic.
Will you be able to achieve the undercover mission?

KEY FEATURES

  • An immersive experience - Get your headphones and let the VFX guide you through the corridors of the palace & enjoy the amazing soundtrack played by the UCM Symphonic Orchestra.
  • Use your occultist powers wisely. The chore mechanic allows you to blind or deafen your enemies, but your perceptions will also change. Be careful!
  • You can’t fight back! Outsmart your enemies and escape without leaving a trace behind.
  • Choose your own play style - there are multiple paths and ways of escaping. Use the powers following your instinct and escape victorious.

You’ll love this game if you:
  • Enjoy infiltration and stealth genres.
  • Like replayability and fast-paced levels with tons of check-points.
  • Love indie games that explore innovative mechanics.
  • You’ve played Shadow Tactics, Serial Cleaners, or Invisible Ink.
